features.title: Access your files, anywhere
features.description: The ability to use a smartphone, tablet, or computer to access your account means your files follow you everywhere.

features.title: Security you can trust
features.description: 2-factor authentication and user-controlled encryption are just a couple of the security features we allow to help secure your files.

features.title: Real-time collaboration
features.description: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required.

features.title: Store any type of file
features.description: Whether you're sharing holidays photos or work documents, Fylo has you covered allowing for all file types to be securely stored and shared.
